# tf.keras.backend.minimum

Element-wise minimum of two tensors.

### Aliases:

* `tf.compat.v1.keras.backend.minimum`
* `tf.compat.v2.keras.backend.minimum`


``` python
tf.keras.backend.minimum(
    x,
    y
)
```



<!-- Placeholder for "Used in" -->


#### Arguments:


* <b>`x`</b>: Tensor or variable.
* <b>`y`</b>: Tensor or variable.


#### Returns:

A tensor.
